2fa.title: Two Factor Autentication
2fa.enableDescription: Two-Factor Authentication is <1>enabled</1>. You will be asked for a verification code when you sign in.
2fa.disableDescription: Two-Factor Authentication is <1>disabled</1>. Enable it to add an extra layer of security to your account.

modal.title: Enter Verification Code
modal.verificationMessage: A verification code has been sent to {{phone}}. Please enter the code below to {{action}} Two-Factor Authentication.

error.title: Error
error.pleaseProvideNumber: Please provide a phone number before enabling Two-Factor Authentication.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data and you will not be able to recover it. Please consider this action carefully.
deleteAccount.warningInfo: This action is irreversible and will delete all your account data, including settings, preferences, and usage history.

modal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
modal.description: Please type DELETE in the fields below to confirm you want to <1>delete</1> your account.
